name: Dev Tool
subtitle: Gives Detailed info about an Upgrade on a pedestal. Also used to see the work area of an upgraded pedestal.

pages.title: Interactions
pages.text: $(li)Just having this in the the players inventory allows creative players to break pedestals. $(li)$(l)Right Click$() a pedestal to see its NBT data. $(li)$(l)Crouch Right Click$() a pedestal with an upgrade to see the upgrades NBT

pages.title: Interactions Cont.
pages.text: $(li)When in the $(l)MAINHAND$() and an item with NBT is in the $(l)OFFHAND, RIGHT CLICK$() to display the items NBT. $(li)When in the $(l)MAINHAND$() and a $(l:pedestals:getting_started/getting_started_coloring/applying)Colored Pallet$() is in the $(l)OFFHAND, RIGHT CLICK$() to display the colors INT value.
